C ya in a week, Minime.

::Striker::

Striker grins at Spears. "Ok, then! Would you mind if we fly maybe three feet 
off the ground?" he asks, instantly regretting the words, "I mean. Um.. 
Nevermind."

He takes a few steps forward, coming closer to her. He bends down, putting 
one arm to her legs and lifting her off the ground. She wasn't too heavy, he 
could easily make it to the Ark.

"Buckle up," he says, smiling at her, as he starts walking toward the Ark, 
then speeding up to a slight jog.
